name: King Naresuan the Great
what_did:
King Naresuan fought to free Thailand from Burmese control.
He is famous for his bravery in battle — especially when he won a fight on elephant-back!
He protected the Thai people and made the kingdom stronger.
why_matters:
He is a national hero who helped keep Thailand independent.
His courage inspired many, and he is honored for defending the country.

questions.q: What is King Naresuan known for?
What kind of king was Naresuan?

fun_fact: King Naresuan fought a famous duel on elephants — and won!
